result.eng: The editor will be attending a conference in Italy next week.

result.eng: We'll have a party next week.
result.ga: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn
result.orig: Beidh cóisir againn an tseachtain seo chugainn

result.eng: The work will be delayed by a week.

result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ann ar feaḋ seaċtaineI was there for a week.

result.eng: We spent a week in Donegal.

result.ponchtml: I riṫ na seaċtaineDuring the week.

result.eng: Monday is the worst day of the week.

result.eng: Some day next week.

result.eng: I wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.orig: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn
result.html: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ mé anseo an tseaċtain seo caite mar ḃí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.eng: I am going to Cork for a week.

result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul go Corcaiġ go ceann seaċtaineI am going to Cork for a week.

result.eng: I am going to Italy in a week.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul go dtí an Iodáil i gceann seachtaine
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul go dtí an Iodáil i gceann seachtaine

result.orig: Tá mé anseo le seachtain
result.html: Tá mé anseo le seachtainI've been here for a week.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé anseo le seaċtainI've been here for a week.

result.eng: I would like to rent a house for a week in the month of April.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom teach a thógáil ar cíos ar feadh seachtaine i mí Aibreáin
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom teach a thógáil ar cíos ar feadh seachtaine i mí Aibreáin

result.eng: After that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
result.ga: Ina dhiaidh sin is breá liom dul go dtí an phictiúrlann i nGaillimh uair sa tseachtain

result.eng: What day of the week would you prefer to travel?

result.eng: One week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ga: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.orig: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar

result.eng: We had a bright week.
result.ga: Bhí seachtain gheal againn
result.orig: Bhí seachtain gheal againn
result.html: Bhí seachtain gheal againnWe had a bright week.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seaċtain ġeal againnWe had a bright week.

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.

result.orig: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine

result.eng: Sundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ga: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.orig: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr

result.eng: I go to a film once a week.

result.html: Téim chuig scannán uair sa tseachtainI go to a film once a week.

result.eng: Until next week, good-bye and God bless.

result.orig: Go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannacht

result.eng: Heavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ga: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.orig: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.html: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit báisteaċ ṫrom níos deireanaí an tseaċtain sin agus ṫarla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.

result.eng: She starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine
result.orig: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine
result.html: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaineShe starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críoċnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíċe seaċt lá in aġaiḋ na seaċtaineShe starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ga: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.orig: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.html: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ponchtml: Anseo i Nua-Eaḃrac ḃí criṫ beag talún againn an tseaċtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.

result.eng: The affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ga: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.orig: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.html: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cás ina ṗríoṁscéal ag na meáin ḟadḃunaiṫe ar feaḋ breis is seaċtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
